data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ivan, Marin, Sergey, Sinelnikov, Agniya, Sokolova (2013): Ecological remarks and re-description of the hermit crab-associated pleustid amphipod Pleusymtes japonica (Gurjanova, 1938) (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Pleustidae: Pleusymtinae) from the Russian coasts of the Sea of Japan. Zootaxa 3640 (4): 581-588, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3640.4.6
